NAME: üìä CSE 100
TITLE: Algorithms
MOTTO: The art of solving problems efficiently
TEXT:

NAME: ‚öôÔ∏è CSE 31

TEXT:

  • Built projects exploring processor datapath design and cache simulation, bridging the gap between hardware and software.
  • Studied instruction set architecture, pipelining, virtual memory, and I/O systems to understand how high-level code maps to machine execution.

NAME: üìö CSE 30

  • Developed debugging and testing practices for complex pointer-based data structures in a systems programming environment.
